name: Enter the Dog-geon
description:
THE PREMISE:

You're a dog. Your goal? Make it out of the dungeon unscathed. Good luck.

CONTROLS:

Movement - WASD keys

Shoot fire - Right click

Reset game - R

DEV'S NOTE:

This game was made by me and two other inexperienced friends over the span of five days. As such, it is very unpolished. Yes, there are several bugs and no, they will never be fixed. This game is not the next Breath of the Wild and was never intended to be.

Please feel free to leave any ratings or feedback! As someone who's just starting out, I would really appreciate any sort of compliments or criticism you have to offer. Thanks!
